name: Re: Hexen
description:
Re: Hexen is  a Re-Imagining of the 90's classic, Hexen!

Many people took many issues with the original Hexen including, weapon count, level design and the lack of difference between the varied classes.

This mod aims to fix all these problems, and have everyone see Hexen as the beautiful classic that I do. 

This is only a preview build, so please bear in mind there are some bugs.

Runs on GZDoom,  You may download the .pk3 itself if you are a experienced user.

THIS GAME IS NOT STANDALONE. YOU WILL NEED A COPY OF HEXEN.WAD

AVAILABLE ON STEAM AND GOG.COM

Tested on a i5 with integrated graphics, 8 gb ram.

Built & play tested on Ubuntu 20.04, also tested on windows 10.
